alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:52PM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting over 30 mph at times. Gusts up to 50 mph are possible across higher elevations of the South Hills and Albion Mountains. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet of the South Hills, Albion Mountains, Marsh and Arbon Highlands, and Bear River Range. This includes Highway 36 over Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Pockets of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
